Download VICE for QNX systems

We are no more providing binaries for QNX. Please get in touch with us if you want to help improving the QNX ports and/or want to provide binaries. Occasionally we might upload unofficial test builds here.

Old (VICE 3.0) binary distributions

  • Binary for x86 QNX 4.x systems: sdlvice-3.0-qnx4.tar.F. to be installed with the QNX 4.x installer.
  • Binary for x86 QNX 6.x systems: VICE-3.0-x86-public.qpr. To be installed with the QNX 6.x installer.
  • Binary for armle QNX 6.x systems: SDLVICE-3.0-armle-public.qpr. To be installed with the QNX 6.x installer.
  • Binary for mipsbe QNX 6.x systems: SDLVICE-3.0-mipsbe-public.qpr. To be installed with the QNX 6.x installer.
  • Binary for mipsle QNX 6.x systems: SDLVICE-3.0-mipsle-public.qpr. To be installed with the QNX 6.x installer.
  • Binary for ppcbe QNX 6.x systems: SDLVICE-3.0-ppcbe-public.qpr. To be installed with the QNX 6.x installer.
  • Binary for shle QNX 6.x systems: SDLVICE-3.0-shle-public.qpr. To be installed with the QNX 6.x installer.

Older binary distributions

Binaries of even older releases can be found on http://www.zimmers.net/anonftp/pub/cbm/crossplatform/emulators/VICE.

For more information visit the main page.
